document_data.mainbody: '''Karsev''' (pronounced KAR-seff) was a member of the [[Cult of the Crushing Wave]] in the [[Moonsea]].
document_data.Possessions: In battle, Karsev wore a suit of [[scalemail]] and fought with a [[hand fork]] and [[shield]].
document_data.Relationships: Karsev was the right-hand of fellow cultist, the [[marel]] [[Shelavassa]].
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], they managed to capture the [[aquatic elf]] prince [[Ulatha Mesavir]] in order to use him as sacrifice to create a ''[[devastation orb]]'' to unleash over [[Mulmaster]]. However, Karsev and his minions were confronted and defeated by an adventuring party hired to destroy the cultist group for their bandit activities near [[River Lis]].
